# Session Summary

Liam really met his goal today by gaining more than 90% accuracy in both his first maths and English! His concentration today was very impressive, as was the level of effort he put in. He should be really proud of himself! Asking for help ☑ Concentration ☑ Effort ☑

Today, I was tutored by Zoe
